name: RAGOFI
description:
RAGOFI is a Visual Novel made during a Game Jam. You play as a journarlist who select which info is true and will be published, and which is false and will be thrown away. You have to find the one that is false to tell the truth to the people.

Except for the false ones, all the infos in the game are real fun facts found on the internet.

Have fun reading and discovering them all !

\!/ The game is in french \!/
